subject: Dear BMW Enthusiast,
body:
Dear BMW Enthusiast,
This is to inform you that you have been selected for a prize of a
brand new 2023 Model BMW 7 Series Car and a Check of $500,000.00usd
from international programs held on this second section of 2023  in
the Roseville California. 95661, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
The selection process was carried out through random selection in our
computerized email selection system (ESS) from a database of over
250,000 email addresses drawn from all the continents of the world
which you were selected.
The BMW Lottery is approved by the British Gaming Board and also
Licensed by the International Association of Gaming Regulators (IAGR).
To begin the processing of your prize you are to contact our BMW
fiduciary claims department for more information as regards procedures
to claim your prize.kindly contact him through
Fiduciary Agent: Henry Pepe
Contact:henrypepe226@gmail.com
Contact him by providing him with your secret pin code Number
BMW:2551256003/23. You are also advised to provide to him
with the under listed information as soon as possible:
1. Name in full.
2. Address.
3. Nationality.
4. Age.
5. Phone/Fax.
6. Present Country.
7. Email address.
8. pin code Number BMW:2551256003/23.
9.Occupation
Note: Do disregard any email as this is a PROMO BMW LOTTERY DEPARTMENT
held this day 20th July, 2023.
BMW CEO Harald Kruger.
THE DIRECTOR PROMOTIONS
BMW SALES LOTTERY DEPARTMENT

subject: Re: Dear BMW Enthusiast,
body:
Dear BMW Sales Lottery Department,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting news. I am thrilled to hear that I have been selected for a brand new BMW Series Car and a cash prize. However, before proceeding further, I would like to gather some more information about the process.

1. Could you please provide me with more details about the selection process? How was it conducted and what criteria were used?

2. Can you explain how the British Gaming Board and the Gaming Regulators are involved in this lottery? What role do they play in ensuring fairness and legitimacy?

3. I would also like to know more about the fiduciary claims department. What is their role in the prize claim process? How can I be sure that my personal information will be handled securely?

4. Is there a deadline for claiming the prize? I want to make sure I have enough time to complete all necessary procedures.

I appreciate your assistance in providing these details so that I can proceed accordingly. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silvia

subject: Re: Dear BMW Enthusiast,.
body:
*Greetings Mr Silvia, The British Gaming Board and the Gaming Regulators
are involved because this winning prize is legal and approved by the
British Government.The deadline for claiming is from today being 9th of
February 2024 to 20th of February 2024.Please sir do fill this information
so that we will not make a mistake and send your winning prize to the wrong
person.1. Name in full...............2. Address....................3.
Nationality....................4. Age/Sex.......................5.
Occupation...........................6.
Phone.............................7. Present
Country.........................8. Email
address................................9. pin code Number
BMW:2550056003/44,Best RegardsMrs Marry.*

subject: Re: Dear BMW Enthusiast,.
body:
Hello Mr. Silvia,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information about the British Gaming Board and the Gaming Regulators. I appreciate you letting me know that this winning prize is legal and approved by them.

Could you please provide me with more details about the prize? What exactly have I won? It would be helpful to know the specific amount or any other relevant information.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "filling this"? Are there any forms or documents that I need to complete in order to claim my prize? If so, where can I find these forms?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silvia
